cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I give you warmth, so you can go out and play. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 I rise in the east.
😎 Without me, Earth would be very cold.

additionalData.remediation: The Sun is the star that gives Earth light and heat.

cosmos.question: I am round and I spin, and you live on me. I have land and water, what could I be?

hints.text: 🏡 I am your home!
🗺️ I have continents and oceans.
🌱 I am the only planet (that we know of) with plants and animals.

additionalData.remediation: Earth is the planet we live on.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth at night, sometimes full, sometimes just a sliver of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me!
🌕 I reflect the sun's light.
🌚 Sometimes I look like a banana.

cosmos.question: I am a bright, shining point, far, far away. You can see me at night, when the sun goes away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔭 I am made of burning gas.
🌌 The Sun is one example of me!

additionalData.remediation: Stars are very far away and look small from Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a cold and red planet, known for dust so fine. Scientists send robots to me, hoping to find a sign. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I'm the color of chocolate!
🚀 Rovers explore my surface.
🔴 They call me the Red Planet.

additionalData.remediation: Mars is known for its red color.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas, with a red spot that swirls. I am the biggest planet; around the sun I twirl. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I have a giant storm.
🪐 I am much bigger than Earth.
✨ I have many moons orbiting me!

additionalData.remediation: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture bright, like a bear or a hunter, shining in the night. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some people call me The Big Dipper.
🌠 I am made of many stars.
✨ I help sailors find their way.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object orbiting the sun, sometimes small, sometimes big, but not a planet, none. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can have a tail made of ice and dust!
💥 Sometimes I crash into planets.
🌑 Some are in a belt between Mars and Jupiter.

cosmos.question: I am a giant collection of stars, gas, and dust, shaped like a spiral, where all these things are trussed. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very, very big!
✨ Earth is a tiny part of me.
💫 Our sun is just one of billions of stars inside me.

additionalData.remediation: A galaxy contains billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am what makes all the stars and planets go 'round, with a pull so strong, nothing can unbound. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree is a sign of me.
🧲 I keep your feet on the ground.
🌎 All planets are kept in orbit by me.

additionalData.remediation: Gravity is a force that pulls things together.

ocean.question: I am very big and salty, and boats like to float on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 Big animals live in me.
🌊 You can swim in me.
⛵️ Boats sail across me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🖍️ I can change colors.
🪨 I like to hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I am a mammal that lives in the ocean. People love to watch me jump and play. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I make clicking sounds.
🐟 I eat fish.
🤸 I'm very smart and playful.

ocean.question: I am a very large fish with sharp teeth, often feared by swimmers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have a fin on my back.
🌊 I live in the ocean.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth.

ocean.question: I’m a very long, skinny fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 Some people think I’m scary!
🕳️ I sometimes hide in small holes.
🌊 I swim in the sea.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have orange and white stripes.
🏠 My home protects me from predators.
🎬 I was in a popular movie.

ocean.question: I am a large sea creature that has a shell with many points and can be different colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I live at the bottom of the ocean.
🖐 I look like a star.
✨ I come in many colors

ocean.question: I am a giant of the sea, the largest animal on Earth. I sing songs but am not a popstar. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I breathe air, like you!
💧 I drink by swallowing lots of seawater at once.
🎼 I make very loud sounds to talk to my family.

ocean.question: I am a place deep in the ocean where no sunlight reaches. It is very cold and mysterious. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 You would need a light to see me
🕳️ I'm very, very far down.
👾 Strange creatures live here.
